publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-8033.1 Patrick Harvie: Celebrating Climate Week, 21 to 27 March 2011—As an amendment to motion (S3M-8033) in the name of Sarah Boyack, insert at end "and hopes that involvement in Climate Week will lead to policy changes by some of the campaign’s corporate partners, such as the withdrawal of RBS investment in oil sands and other fossil fuel activity".
S3M-8033.1 Celebrating Climate Week, 21 to 27 March 2011 (lodged on 1 March 2011) Bill Wilson*, Robin Harper*
S3M-8033.1 Celebrating Climate Week, 21 to 27 March 2011 (lodged on 1 March 2011) Cathy Peattie*
